name: "Body of Research"
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.

name: "Body of Research"
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.

name: Letter of Acceptance
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Letter of Acceptance: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The letter unfolded, inviting the twins to Strixhaven. Will saw a chance for arcane study. Rowan saw a chance for power.

name: Team Pennant
flavor_text: Choosing a college based on Mage Tower results is discouraged, but not unheard of.

name: Square Up
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes the most radical thing you can do is think inside the box.

name: Serpentine Curve
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Math bites."
—Bim, Lorehold mage-student

name: Expel
oracle_text: Exile target tapped creature.
flavor_text: Quintorius was a daydreamer, far happier digging through history books than practicing battle tactics. He agreed with the military academy on only one thing: he not belong in their ranks.

name: Biomathematician
oracle_text: When Biomathematician enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Fractal you control.
flavor_text: "I will reach infinity."

name: Quandrix Cultivator
oracle_text: When Quandrix Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: In the gardens spread across Quandrix campus, fern turns to forest before class is even over.

name: Galazeth Prismari
oracle_text:
Flying
When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."

name: Galazeth Prismari
oracle_text:
Flying
When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."

name: "The Scientific Bap"
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {3}.

name: "Fern Guy-ly"
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.

name: Crackle with Power
oracle_text: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to up to X targets.
flavor_text: Will gasped as Rowan drew from the raw power of the Strixhaven Snarl. For a moment, she was luminous, transcendent, terrible.

name: Ecological Appreciation
oracle_text: Search your library and graveyard for up to four creature cards with different names that each have mana value X or less and reveal them. An opponent choses two of those cards. Shuffle the chosen cards into your library and put the rest onto the battlefield. Exile Ecological Appreciation.

preview.source: クロタカ統率者[EDH]チャンネル

name: Tenured Inkcaster
oracle_text:
When Tenured Inkcaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Ah, another future archmage for my collection."

name: Teach by Example
oracle_text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"Learning to imitate a master is the first step in becoming one."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

name: Archway Commons
oracle_text:
Archway Commons enters the battlefield tapped.
When Archway Commons enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Elemental Masterpiece
oracle_text:
Create two 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature tokens.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Elemental Masterpiece: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Rootha passed with flying, living colors.

name: Strixhaven Stadium
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}. Put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium.
Whenever a create deals combat damage to you, remove a point counter from Strixhaven Stadium.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium. Then if it has ten or more point counters on it, remove them all and that player loses the game.

name: Hall Monitor
oracle_text:
Haste
{1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "No unauthorized summoning. No writing in the library books. And absolutely no indoor dueling!"

name: Zimone, Quandrix Prodigy
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
{4}, {T}: Draw a card, if you control eight or more lands, draw two cards instead.
flavor_text: "What are they complaining about? It's not like axiomatic leyline paratrigonometrics is hard."

name: Quandrix Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quandrix Pledgemage.
flavor_text: "The first step toward transcending physical limitations is discarding assumptions about what is possible."

name: Manifestation Sage
oracle_text: When Manifestation Sage enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: The first thing a Quandrix mage learns is the laws of metaphysics. The second thing is how to break them.

name: Cogwork Archivist
oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"It's the largest library in the Multiverse. Of course it has the largest librarians."
—Kasmina

name: Teachings of the Archaics
oracle_text: If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.

name: Verdant Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: Culmination of Studies
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Baleful Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

name: Expressive Iteration
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
flavor_text: Primary students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.

name: Codie, Vociferous Codex
oracle_text:
You can't cast permanent spells.
{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Strixhaven Stadium
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}. Put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium.
Whenever a create deals combat damage to you, remove a point counter from Strixhaven Stadium.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium. Then if it has ten or more point counters on it, remove them all and that player loses the game.

name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

card_faces.name: Torrent Sculptor
card_faces.oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
When Torrent Sculptor enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Torrent Sculptor equal to half that card's mana value, rounded up.

card_faces.name: Flamethrower Sonata
card_faces.oracle_text: Discard a card, then draw a card. When you discard an instant or sorcery card this way, Flamethrower Sonata deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

name: Aether Helix
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Some Quandrix mages prefer to study at twilight, watching their experimental equations trace glowing trails against the encroaching darkness.

name: "Needling Drake"
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch

name: "Reflective Hulk"
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only "Reflective Hulk", you may pay {2} to copy that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Leonin Lightscribe
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn,
flavor_text: All who hear his inspiring words are filled with hope and pride.

name: Leonin Lightscribe
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn,

name: Fervent Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{R}{R} cost was paid, an opponent discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Search your library for up to three cards, put them into your hand, shuffle, then discard three cards at random.

name: "Hungry Chomp Rider"
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 creature on target creature you control.

name: "Frog Fractals"
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token and put X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: "Oggyar Battle Seer"
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Scry 1.

name: "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So"
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
"I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So" deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Exile "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So".

name: "Forum Mooderator"
oracle_text: Whenever "Forum Mooderator" attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to the bottom of your library. If you do, exile top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.

name: Culmination of Studies
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.

name: Sudden Breakthrough
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Rootha created constantly, passionately, in hopes of impressing her greatest critic: herself.

name: Resculpt
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor_text: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.

name: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
oracle_text:
Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.
+2: Scry 1.
−X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
−8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

name: "Malestrom Muse"
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever "Malestrom Muse" attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is "Malestrom Muse"'s power as this ability resolves.
